Detailed Description

Accessor class to read data from an ObexBuffer.

ObexBuffer::Size ObexBuffer::Reader::CopyTo (  DataPtr  dest_ptr,
Size  dest_size
) 
 

Copies data into an external buffer.

This method reads at most dest_size octets from the ObexBuffer and copies them into the external buffer referenced by 'dest_ptr'. After reading, the offset of the reader is advanced automatically, so don't call Commit() manually when you use this style of reading.

Parameters:
dest_ptr Pointer to a destination buffer where data read from the ObexBuffer is copied
dest_size Size of the destination buffer where data read from the ObexBuffer is copied
Returns:
Number of octets actually copied. This is a value between '0' and 'dest_size'.

ObexBuffer::Size ObexBuffer::Reader::GetNoBytesReadable (   )  const
 

Returns the number of bytes which can be read.
